zombie.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who moves very slowly and does not seem to be thinking about what they are doing, especially because they are very tired
zombie.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I walked around like a zombie for most of the day.
zombie.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a dead person whose body is made to move by magic, according to some African and Caribbean religions
zombie.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a computer that someone has secretly gained control of and uses to do things such as send spam (=unwanted emails sent to a large number of people)
